page.title: 16Cubs and Scouts, Goatacre.
page.content: Some of the boys in our area go to cubs in Goatacre.The cub pack is called Goatacre 1st and meets at Goatacre Village Hall every Monday.Our two leaders are Akela,Mick Stoddart and Shere Khan,Fred Taylor.Our pack has two sixes, red and blue.On June 24th the pack went on a trip to RAF Lyneham.When the cubs are old enough they can become Scouts. Our Scout troop in Goatacre is called 1st Goatacre Scout troop and is run by Skip, Fred Taylor and Tony Twigg. Our meetings are from 17.30 until 19.30. At the beginning we try for certain proficiency badges and then we have one or two games like Pin-down and murder-ball and then we do other things till flag down. Then one of the troop goes and lowers the union flag and then we have a prayer before we go home.
